name: Laser Rage
description:
Joe is a famous Space Adventurer, but one of the reasons for him to be so good is because he does a lot of training. The VLCHS (Virtual Laser Chamber Hardcore Survival) is one of the most challenging simulator, and consists on 3 simple rules:

1 - Get Energy Orbs!

2 - Fly like there's no tomorrow!

3 - And the most important: AVOID THE LASERS!!!
